synopsis.text: Rangers defend Earth from an alien organization with a nefarious plot to conquer the world. Among the organization's ranks is a high-ranking officer, known as the General, who usually engages in fierce battles against the Rangers. However, even villains need a break from their evil schemes. Today, the General takes a well-deserved day off to recharge. He visits the zoo to admire the pandas and stops by a convenience store for some ice cream, all while blending in as an ordinary human. This comedic tale offers a delightful twist on the classic battle between good and evil, showcasing the lighter side of a villain's life. Will the General ultimately succeed in his quest for world domination, or will his days off prove more enjoyable than he anticipated?
